seo.title: Quilliams Gardening
seo.description: From weekly mowing and garden maintenance to full yard clean-ups and landscape improvements, we deliver stress-free, dependable care that keeps your outdoor spaces beautiful, functional, and something you can truly be proud of.

hero.subheading: From weekly mowing and garden maintenance to full yard clean-ups and landscape improvements, we deliver stress-free, dependable care that keeps your outdoor spaces beautiful, functional, and something you can truly be proud of.

about.body:
At Quilliams Gardening & Landscaping, we help homeowners enjoy clean, healthy, and beautiful outdoor spaces‚Äîwithout the physical work or time commitment. Whether you need regular mowing, garden maintenance, landscaping improvements, or a full yard clean-up, our team provides dependable, professional care tailored to your property and lifestyle.

We proudly serve homeowners who value their time, comfort, and peace of mind. From retirees who want to enjoy their yard without the strain, to busy families who simply don‚Äôt have the hours to maintain it, we take care of the details so you don‚Äôt have to.

Our approach is simple: show up when we say we will, do the job properly, and leave your yard looking better every time. We use proven best practices to keep landscapes healthy, attractive, and easy to maintain‚Äîseason after season.
about.imageAlt: Levi hedge trimming a large hedge

features.title: Quality
features.description: We take pride in doing the job right, using professional equipment and proven techniques to deliver consistent, long-lasting results.

features.title: Satisfaction
features.description: Your satisfaction matters. We listen to your needs, communicate clearly, and make sure every service meets your expectations.

features.title: Sustainability
features.description: We care for your landscape responsibly, focusing on healthy growth, smart maintenance, and practices that protect your yard for the long term.

items.title: Garden makeover + tidy up
items.description: A full tidy-up to bring an overgrown garden back under control‚Äîclean lines, shaped growth, and a lawn that looks cared for again.
items.imageAlt: Freshly maintained garden with tidy hedges and a neat lawn
items.perfectFor: Previously overgrown with weeds and oversized bushes/hedges. We weeded thoroughly, shaped the hedges and bushes, and finished with a fresh lawn mow.

items.title: Leylandii hedge trim (4m tall)
items.description: A crisp Leylandii hedge trim to keep growth even, tidy, and manageable‚Äîdone cleanly with a sharp finish.
items.imageAlt: Front garden with neat lawn edges and trimmed hedges
items.perfectFor: A 10m long Leylandii hedge around 4m tall, trimmed as part of a twice-yearly routine to keep it neat and under control.

items.title: Full gravel garden transformation
items.description: A complete gravel garden install for a clean, low-maintenance finish, with rustic edging to keep everything looking intentional.
items.imageAlt: Freshly mown lawn with trimmed hedges in a private garden
items.perfectFor: A full gravel garden built over 3 days, featuring rustic edging plus a lily bed that was mulched for a neat, finished look.

faq.description: Got more questions? Reach out to us using the button below

items.question: How much does a garden makeover cost?
items.answer: Costs vary based on the size of the space and the scope of work. We‚Äôll recommend options that fit your goals after a quick chat and site visit.

items.question: Will I need planning permission for my project?
items.answer: It depends on the type of work and local requirements. We can help you understand what may be needed before you commit to the project.

items.question: How long will the work take?
items.answer: Timelines depend on the complexity of the design and site conditions. We‚Äôll share a clear schedule once we confirm the plan and materials.

items.question: Can you work with my existing garden features?
items.answer: Yes‚Äîwhere possible, we can incorporate existing features into the new design. We‚Äôll advise what can be kept, improved, or repositioned.

items.question: Do you offer maintenance after the project is finished?
items.answer: We can discuss ongoing upkeep options to help your garden stay in great shape. The right plan depends on the planting and your preferences.

items.question: What areas do you cover?
items.answer: Coverage depends on your location and the type of job. Send us your postcode and we‚Äôll confirm availability and next steps.

testimonials.heading: Don‚Äôt just take our word for it
testimonials.description: Hear what homeowners say about working with us.

items.name: Matthew Wellington
items.quote: ‚ÄúGreat service from start to finish. He cut down a few hedges for us and did a brilliant job ‚Äì quick, tidy, and very reasonably priced. Everything was left neat and exactly how we wanted it. Would definitely recommend and use again.‚Äù

items.name: Hannah B
items.quote: ‚ÄúWe recently contacted Qwilliams mowing as we are selling our house so desperately needed the garden tidied up. I have been putting this off for months as I had no idea where to start. We are extremely pleased with the result - Levi did an amazing job! He was very professional and listened to what we wanted. We will definitely be regular customers of Qwilliams mowing and would highly recommend to anyone looking for garden services!‚Äù

items.name: Elizabeth Cawley
items.quote: ‚ÄúLevi has done an excellent job on my gardens meadow reset. Prompt and friendly. The job completed was exactly as I asked. And he left the area very tidy. I would recommend him to anyone.‚Äù

items.name: Michael Meer
items.quote: ‚ÄúLevi came for the first time yesterday. I don't know anything about gardening - but Levi does! What to cut, what not to cut, when to cut it and how it should be cut. He works really hard - non-stop, has really good ideas for making a garden both tidy and practical and his prices a very competitive. What's more, he's a really nice bloke. I've already booked him for a second visit.‚Äù

items.name: Robert Jakes
items.quote: ‚ÄùAmazing transformation of a massive hedge that had got too big for me to cope with, would highly recommend Levi Quilliams Mowingüòä‚Äù

items.name: James Watson
items.quote: ‚ÄùHighly recommended! Levi helped us out with our hedge cutting and lawn mowing. Extremely reliable and did exceptional job. We will certainly be getting him back!‚Äù

items.name: James Perrin
items.quote: ‚ÄùWe recently instructed Levi to look after some sizeable gardens in Porth. Really impressed with him - hardworking, polite and professional. He did a great job on his first visit and is now going to be taking care of regular garden maintenance for us. Would highly recommend him.‚Äù

items.name: Chris Hall
items.quote: ‚ÄùCame and gave me a reasonable quote to cut Hedges. Turned up next day to do the work on time. Pleased with the work done and cleared all the cuttings up. Would use again fully recommend..‚Äù

items.name: Maya J
items.quote: ‚ÄùLevi did an amazing job in my garden! Everything was done to a high standard, making sure to leave it clean and tidy at the end. He is super friendly and reliable ‚Äî highly recommend!‚Äù

items.name: Jamie Q
items.quote: ‚ÄùBooked a one-off clean and was so impressed I signed up for regular mowing. Super reliable and the lawn always looks great. Highly recommend!‚Äù

items.name: Kim Brocklehurst
items.quote: ‚ÄùQuick response to initial enquiry. Fast and thorough clearance of overgrown land. Will definitely use Levi again.‚Äù

items.name: Marie Preston
items.quote: ‚ÄùLevi is always professional in manner and services required. I highly recommend him!‚Äù

items.name: Pat Batey
items.quote: ‚ÄùA great job carried out at a sensible price.‚Äù
